title: low elo ranked is a mess
body: Where do I start,  ranked play in the lowest levels is a mess.  Most games, at least one afk in game, or more.  Most games, one or more players quit at first blood, or tilt into troll mode.  RIOT you do not have to ban them from play, just ranked play.  Look at your discussion boards, the problem is getting worse, not better.  Please consider ranked bans for extended periods.  Thanks!

replies.body:
I'm stuck in silver 4. Just got out of a game where I was ADC. My support died 2 times in the first 10 minutes and this sent our jungler, a Jax, into a toxic spiral tirade. Then he said "i'm bored i'm gonna int." 

Then he proceeded to die to the enemy mid 5 times in a row. Then left the game. 

Yeah we lost.
you can already get banned due to excessive afking and leaving games

People already get banned from ranked for AFKing.

Oddly it does not stop them. You cant apply logic to trash and expect it to find traction.
